data: {"concept_id": "character_description", "concept_name": "Character Description", "type": "element", "definition": "The selective physical and behavioral details that let readers see and feel a person on the page.", "scope_notes": "Prioritize meaningful, mood-carrying details tied to action; reveal in layers; integrate body logic; strength dials low→medium→high.", "axes": "focus|strength", "axis_values": "appearance|body_logic|style|signature_detail|symbolic | low|medium|high", "prerequisites": "", "pairs_well_with": "body_logic|voice|backstory|tension|setting", "conflicts_with": "laundry_list|cliche|static_snapshot|tone_mismatch|overwriting", "positive_examples_ref": "ex_char_desc_*", "non_examples_ref": "ex_char_desc_weak_*", "source_file": "Character Description.md", "source_md5": "e0a0047460506e098fa0335da2c63607", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:26:41.009892Z"}

{"concept_id": "character_description", "signal_id": "sig_meaningful_select", "signal_type": "textual_cue", "axis_value": "signature_detail", "description": "One or two specific details carry mood or history.", "detection_hint": "Charged objects, scars, wear patterns, kept/avoided items.", "false_positive_risks": "Novelty props with no story link.", "minimal_example": "A frayed cuff where a ring used to rub.", "counterexample": "A random hat detail that never matters.", "source_file": "Character Description.md", "source_md5": "e0a0047460506e098fa0335da2c63607", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:26:41.009892Z"}

{"concept_id": "character_description", "signal_id": "sig_tied_to_action", "signal_type": "textual_cue", "axis_value": "body_logic", "description": "Description attached to movement/choice, not static listing.", "detection_hint": "Gestures + decisions in same breath.", "false_positive_risks": "Standing-still inventories.", "minimal_example": "She tightens her jacket, fingers shaking, and steps through.", "counterexample": "She wears a black jacket.", "source_file": "Character Description.md", "source_md5": "e0a0047460506e098fa0335da2c63607", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:26:41.009892Z"}

{"concept_id": "character_description", "signal_id": "sig_emotional_tone", "signal_type": "textual_cue", "axis_value": "symbolic", "description": "Details evoke emotion/foreshadowing beyond looks.", "detection_hint": "Word choices that carry dread, tenderness, pride.", "false_positive_risks": "Pretty words with no effect.", "minimal_example": "His smile sits too wide for the room.", "counterexample": "“He smiled.”", "source_file": "Character Description.md", "source_md5": "e0a0047460506e098fa0335da2c63607", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:26:41.009892Z"}

{"concept_id": "character_description", "signal_id": "sig_avoid_cliche", "signal_type": "textual_cue", "axis_value": "style", "description": "Fresh, specific phrasing over stock traits.", "detection_hint": "Concrete nouns, verbs; avoid generic ‘blue eyes/tall’.", "false_positive_risks": "Stereotype checklists.", "minimal_example": "Eyes like rain on tin roofs.", "counterexample": "Long blonde hair, blue eyes.", "source_file": "Character Description.md", "source_md5": "e0a0047460506e098fa0335da2c63607", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:26:41.009892Z"}

{"concept_id": "character_description", "signal_id": "sig_layered_reveal", "signal_type": "structural_pattern", "axis_value": "appearance", "description": "Spread details over beats and scenes; evolve with mood.", "detection_hint": "Different moments reveal different facets.", "false_positive_risks": "One big dump at page one.", "minimal_example": "We notice the bitten nails only when the key sticks.", "counterexample": "A page of head-to-toe at entrance.", "source_file": "Character Description.md", "source_md5": "e0a0047460506e098fa0335da2c63607", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:26:41.009892Z"}

{"concept_id": "character_description", "signal_id": "sig_body_language", "signal_type": "structural_pattern", "axis_value": "body_logic", "description": "Posture, gesture, pace, breath add character info.", "detection_hint": "Show confidence, fear, control via body cues.", "false_positive_risks": "Eye-color focus only.", "minimal_example": "He fills the doorway but sits on the edge of his chair.", "counterexample": "He is tall.", "source_file": "Character Description.md", "source_md5": "e0a0047460506e098fa0335da2c63607", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:26:41.009892Z"}

{"concept_id": "character_description", "signal_id": "sig_match_tone", "signal_type": "structural_pattern", "axis_value": "style", "description": "Description style matches genre/scene tone.", "detection_hint": "Sharp/sparse for thriller; lush/warm for romance.", "false_positive_risks": "Tone clash or purple passages.", "minimal_example": "Knife-clean lines in a chase scene.", "counterexample": "Flowery paragraph mid-fight.", "source_file": "Character Description.md", "source_md5": "e0a0047460506e098fa0335da2c63607", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:26:41.009892Z"}

{"concept_id": "character_description", "signal_id": "sig_strength_low", "signal_type": "structural_pattern", "axis_value": "low", "description": "Bare, functional labels; minimal emotional carry.", "detection_hint": "One bland trait or silhouette.", "false_positive_risks": "Confusion/disconnection risk.", "minimal_example": "‘Tall man in a suit.’", "counterexample": "", "source_file": "Character Description.md", "source_md5": "e0a0047460506e098fa0335da2c63607", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:26:41.009892Z"}

{"concept_id": "character_description", "signal_id": "sig_strength_med", "signal_type": "structural_pattern", "axis_value": "medium", "description": "A few vivid, tied-to-action details that stick.", "detection_hint": "2–3 details + body cue spread naturally.", "false_positive_risks": "Occasional cliché.", "minimal_example": "Scuffed boots, paint under nails, a careful smile.", "counterexample": "", "source_file": "Character Description.md", "source_md5": "e0a0047460506e098fa0335da2c63607", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:26:41.009892Z"}

{"concept_id": "character_description", "signal_id": "sig_strength_high", "signal_type": "outcome_change", "axis_value": "high", "description": "Rich, dynamic, symbolic details integrated with movement; description deepens turning points.", "detection_hint": "Body logic alters how we read a beat; details evolve.", "false_positive_risks": "Overwriting that stalls momentum.", "minimal_example": "Makeup smears; the grin hardens; the ring stays on the table.", "counterexample": "", "source_file": "Character Description.md", "source_md5": "e0a0047460506e098fa0335da2c63607", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:26:41.009892Z"}

{"concept_id": "character_description", "misconception_id": "laundry_list", "description": "Checklist of traits dumps at once.", "tells": "Head-to-toe inventory stalls story.", "likely_causes": "Belief that ‘complete’ equals ‘clear’.", "corrective_feedback": "Select 1–3 charged details and embed in action.", "micro_drill": "Cut list into 3 beats tied to choices.", "source_file": "Character Description.md", "source_md5": "e0a0047460506e098fa0335da2c63607", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:26:41.009892Z"}

{"concept_id": "character_description", "misconception_id": "cliche", "description": "Generic adjectives and stereotypes stand in for specifics.", "tells": "‘Long blonde hair, blue eyes’; ‘piercing gaze’.", "likely_causes": "Relying on defaults.", "corrective_feedback": "Swap to concrete nouns/verbs; add history link.", "micro_drill": "Replace 3 clichés with specific, story-linked details.", "source_file": "Character Description.md", "source_md5": "e0a0047460506e098fa0335da2c63607", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:26:41.009892Z"}

{"concept_id": "character_description", "misconception_id": "static_snapshot", "description": "Description frozen on entrance; never evolves.", "tells": "No change across moods or time.", "likely_causes": "Forgetting scene pressure.", "corrective_feedback": "Layer reveal with mood shifts and action.", "micro_drill": "Add one new cue at a turning point.", "source_file": "Character Description.md", "source_md5": "e0a0047460506e098fa0335da2c63607", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:26:41.009892Z"}

{"concept_id": "character_description", "misconception_id": "tone_mismatch", "description": "Style clashes with scene genre or stakes.", "tells": "Overly ornate in chase; jokey in grief.", "likely_causes": "Stylistic habit overrides need.", "corrective_feedback": "Match sentence rhythm to scene pressure.", "micro_drill": "Rewrite 5 lines to fit tone.", "source_file": "Character Description.md", "source_md5": "e0a0047460506e098fa0335da2c63607", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:26:41.009892Z"}

{"concept_id": "character_description", "misconception_id": "overwriting", "description": "So much description the momentum dies.", "tells": "Paragraphs of texture with no effect.", "likely_causes": "Confusing density with depth.", "corrective_feedback": "Trim to what changes reading of the moment.", "micro_drill": "Condense 5 sentences to 2 that carry mood + motive.", "source_file": "Character Description.md", "source_md5": "e0a0047460506e098fa0335da2c63607", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:26:41.009892Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_char_desc_identify_strength_focus", "concept_id": "character_description", "cognitive_goal": "identify", "task_type": "classify", "prompt_template": "Label the passage’s strength (low/medium/high) and dominant focus (appearance/body_logic/style/signature_detail/symbolic). Justify with one quoted cue.", "expected_features": "Accurate strength+focus; evidence cites a specific detail tied to action/mood.", "scoring_method": "pattern|rubric", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Accurate labels + precise evidence affecting story read", "Meets": "Mostly accurate with basic evidence", "Developing": "Labels off or evidence generic"}, "distractor_strategy": "Include pretty-but-empty lines as traps.", "hint_steps": "1) Underline the charged detail 2) Ask what it changes 3) Choose labels", "variation_axes": "focus|strength", "difficulty": 2, "source_file": "Character Description.md", "source_md5": "e0a0047460506e098fa0335da2c63607", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:26:41.009892Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_char_desc_layer_and_move", "concept_id": "character_description", "cognitive_goal": "revise", "task_type": "transform", "prompt_template": "Break a laundry-list paragraph into three scene-placed details tied to actions.", "expected_features": "Each detail lands with purpose; pacing improves; body logic present.", "scoring_method": "rubric", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Three purposeful placements that shape beats", "Meets": "Two land cleanly; one neutral", "Developing": "Still list-like"}, "distractor_strategy": "Tempt a single mid-scene dump.", "hint_steps": "1) Pick 3 charged details 2) Tie each to an action 3) Place at pressure points", "variation_axes": "placement|action", "difficulty": 3, "source_file": "Character Description.md", "source_md5": "e0a0047460506e098fa0335da2c63607", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:26:41.009892Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_char_desc_match_tone", "concept_id": "character_description", "cognitive_goal": "diagnose", "task_type": "spot_fix", "prompt_template": "The description style clashes with the scene tone. Rewrite it to fit genre and stakes.", "expected_features": "Sentence rhythm and diction align with scene pressure.", "scoring_method": "rubric", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Tone match sharp; momentum better", "Meets": "Mostly aligned", "Developing": "Mismatch remains"}, "distractor_strategy": "Overly ornate vs bare bones traps.", "hint_steps": "1) Identify tone 2) Adjust sentence length/verbs 3) Keep 1 signature detail", "variation_axes": "tone|genre", "difficulty": 2, "source_file": "Character Description.md", "source_md5": "e0a0047460506e098fa0335da2c63607", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:26:41.009892Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_char_desc_symbolic_detail", "concept_id": "character_description", "cognitive_goal": "compose", "task_type": "generate", "prompt_template": "Invent one signature detail that silently signals history or motive, and place it in action.", "expected_features": "Detail is specific, carries emotion, and recurs or matters.", "scoring_method": "rubric", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Detail reads inevitable and pays off", "Meets": "Specific and suggestive", "Developing": "Novelty with no link"}, "distractor_strategy": "Cool-but-empty gadgets.", "hint_steps": "1) Choose history 2) Find physical sign 3) Put it in motion", "variation_axes": "symbol|history", "difficulty": 3, "source_file": "Character Description.md", "source_md5": "e0a0047460506e098fa0335da2c63607", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:26:41.009892Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_char_desc_1", "concept_id": "character_description", "axis_value": "signature_detail|medium", "label": "strong", "text": "Her wedding ring lived on a chain, not her finger.", "context_tags": "history|relationship", "source_file": "Character Description.md", "source_md5": "e0a0047460506e098fa0335da2c63607", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:26:41.009892Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_char_desc_2", "concept_id": "character_description", "axis_value": "body_logic|high", "label": "strong", "text": "He fills the doorway but perches on the chair’s edge.", "context_tags": "power|unease", "source_file": "Character Description.md", "source_md5": "e0a0047460506e098fa0335da2c63607", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:26:41.009892Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_char_desc_3", "concept_id": "character_description", "axis_value": "symbolic|high", "label": "strong", "text": "Lipstick smeared into a grin he didn’t wear.", "context_tags": "mask|foreshadow", "source_file": "Character Description.md", "source_md5": "e0a0047460506e098fa0335da2c63607", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:26:41.009892Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_char_desc_weak_1", "concept_id": "character_description", "axis_value": "", "label": "weak", "text": "Tall man. Blue eyes. Expensive shoes.", "context_tags": "laundry_list|cliche", "source_file": "Character Description.md", "source_md5": "e0a0047460506e098fa0335da2c63607", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:26:41.009892Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_char_desc_weak_2", "concept_id": "character_description", "axis_value": "", "label": "weak", "text": "Her beauty was beyond description.", "context_tags": "vague|overwriting", "source_file": "Character Description.md", "source_md5": "e0a0047460506e098fa0335da2c63607", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:26:41.009892Z"}
